## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description    | Type                                                                    | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `dot`     | `dot`     | Dot-only badge | `boolean`                                                               | `false`     |
| `pill`    | `pill`    | Pill shape     | `boolean`                                                               | `false`     |
| `size`    | `size`    | Size           | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                                  | `'md'`      |
| `variant` | `variant` | Visual variant | `"default" \| "error" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'default'` |
